thread.title: Paul from Chesterfield, NJ
thread.title_full: KT Performance reviewed by Paul from Chesterfield, NJ

author: Paul from Chesterfield, NJ
title: Paul from Chesterfield, NJ
text: Purchased three B&W Biker Bars. Price was $30.00 less for each unit then anyone else. The units shipped promptly and arrived as scheduled. Units were exactly as advertised and in new/undamaged condition. Will definitely look to KT first for any additional purchases!
